main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties

Class SingleStateUIProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties.UIProperty
      • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties.SingleStateUIProperty

  • public class SingleStateUIProperty
extends UIProperty
    A UIProperty that accepts only a single state, whose value can be set by the user in the configuration wizard.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps
